items.content_html: This Node.js project is a application designed to generate QR codes from user-provided URLs. It utilizes the 'inquirer' package to prompt users for input and the 'qr-image' package to generate QR codes. The generated QR code images are then saved locally using the 'fs' module. This lightweight application demonstrates the use of npm packages
items.title: KristinaMacias/QR-Code-Generator: This Node.js project is a application designed to generate QR codes from user-provided URLs. It utilizes the 'inquirer' package to prompt users for input and the 'qr-image' package to generate QR codes. The generated QR code images are then saved locally using the 'fs' module. This lightweight application demonstrates the use of npm packages
